data.text:
@SenCortezMasto MEDIA IS YOUR LAST BREATH
THEN THE BLEED OUT BEGINS

@SenCortezMasto Have you ever looked at the airfares between Canada and Las Vegas? Outrageous! Start there. Maybe that's why fewer Canadians come to Vegas. Thank Air Canada, Westjet and Canadian taxes on airfares.
@SenCortezMasto Nevadans first??  No, you’re only worried about Democrats.

@SenCortezMasto Tourism was destroyed by leftist policies. No one wants to visit crime infested Las Vegas. BTW it's not Trumps fault the strip is so greedy. How about you tell the casinos to quit gouging the customers. Thats what killed tourism. If you dont understand that to the core, then you https://t.co/kFJ0ETS4TA
@SenCortezMasto Tourism is down because the damn hotels charge too much and the stupid resort fee has nothing to do with tariffs you stupid woman. You are incapable of being accountable.

@SenCortezMasto Be quiet, you hypocrite, you guys cause all the problems by having open borders and grafting and still in US citizens, money via NGO donations and kickbacks. We don’t buy any of more of your double talk rhetoric. No one is above the law your time will come.
